title: The excellent history of the merchant of Venice VVith the extreme cruelty of Shylocke the Iew towards the saide merchant, in cutting a iust pound of his flesh. And the obtaining of Portia, by the choyse of three caskets. VVritten by VV. Shakespeare.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Printed by I. Roberts [i.e. by William Jaggard for Thomas Pavier],
notes: The imprint is false; actually printed in 1619 by William Jaggard for the Shakespearian collection of that year (see Greg, III, p. 1107-9).
Running title reads: The comicall history of the merchant of Venice.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
